content:
Luca Limongelli 2012-10-09 7250 GR project - Web site Projet GR - site web Proyecto GR - sitio web 500 GR project - Web site Projet GR - Site Web Proyecto GR - Sitio Web GR_WS_CP FAO 2013-07-16 166285 GR Endorsements The Global Record of Fishing Vessels, Refrigerated Transport Vessels and Supply Vessels has received many expressions of support over the years and recently these have increased due to growing international concerns about the ravages of IUU fishing and the commitment to use a variety of MCS tools to fight it.

This section intends to share the latest statements of support, agreements, collaborations, contributions, etc, that make the Global Record possible.

Each sub-page included in this section provides specific information on each type and source of support.

  • EC Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Commissioner’s statement of support to the Global Record
  • United States of America’s Presidential Task Force on Combating Illegal, Unreported, and Unregulated (IUU) Fishing and Seafood Fraud. Read here recommendation 2.D on US continuous support to the Global Record.
]]>
